title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 180-3.30 - Enforcement Powers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 180-3.30 - Enforcement Powers

State Regulations
OCFS shall exercise its authority to enforce the provisions
of this subpart in a manner consistent with Social Services Law section 460-d
and 18 NYCRR Part
343
relating to the hearing process for residential care
programs for children. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
180-3.30

Adopted

New

York State Register July 25, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 30, eff. 7/25/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
